data.text:
John Carter of Mars: Gods of the Forgotten is the twelfth book of the Martian series. It was announced as part of the Edgar Rice Burroughs Universe on July 19, 2019, at San Diego Comic-Con.[1] [2]

Synopsis[]

After his strange arrival on Barsoom, John Carter battled countless perils to win the heart of his beloved Dejah Thoris and went on to shatter the age-old chains that bound his adopted world to a false religion. But now an ancient and monstrous evil stirs beneath the Red Planetâ€™s surface and threatens to destroy all he holds dear.

Cover Gallery[]
